scripts.release: npm install && bower install && gulp build --env=release
scripts.master: npm install && bower install && gulp build --env=master
scripts.start: npm install && bower install && gulp && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080
scripts.unit: npm install && bower install && gulp && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js
scripts.e2e: npm install && bower install && gulp && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && start webdriver-manager start && start node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080 && protractor test/e2e/protractor-conf.js
scripts.start-nix: npm install && bower install && gulp && (node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json & node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 & node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080)
scripts.unit-nix: npm install && bower install && gulp && (node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json & node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 & karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js)
scripts.e2e-nix: npm install && bower install && gulp && (node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json & node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 & webdriver-manager start & node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080 & protractor test/e2e/protractor-conf.js)
